name: Dynamic Shooting VR
description:
Dynamic Shooting VR is the ultimate practical shooting simulator! Compete across different ranges with captivating themes and challenging parkours. Experience intense gameplay with fine tuned weapon mechanics. Become a champion marksman. Are you ready for the thrill?



No motion sickness, very comfortable VR experience! You may play sitting or standing!



Shooting ranges with various themes, targets and weapons. Yes, we have Western!



Perfect for party playing with your famiy and friends. Compete with your friends with your highscores!

We still have ranges and guns under development for the future releases, stay tuned for more!
